app.title: App Settings
app.text: <0>Adjust the default <1>appearance settings</1> for the app. These settings determine how information is displayed throughout the app (for example: balances, reports and charts), but do not effect individual invoice settings.</0>

toast.success: Your app settings have been successfully updated!
toast.error: Something went wrong. Your app settings were not updated.

invoices.title: Invoice Settings
invoices.text: These are the default settings that will appear when you create a new invoice. You can also add or edit this information on individual invoices when creating them.
invoices.desc: <0>To add/edit your contact information (Company Name, Email, etc.), edit your <1>Company Profile</1> in your account.</0>

toast.success: Your invoice settings have been successfully updated!
toast.error: Something went wrong. Your invoice settings were not updated.
